title: Bees
text:
Bees are dying. Some people say it's the chemicals being sprayed in the air, also known as chemtrails.
Some say it's judgment...the end of the world is near...
Still others say it's the GMO foods...unnatural, unholy garbage...the insects don't have a defense against the toxins.
I say it's Fred.
The jerk was stung one time as a kid, and now he thinks all bees are out to get him.
He chose his occupation (pest control) as a result of that sting.
And now, he goes from town to town, obliterating every bee and wasp he finds.
I tried reporting him, but nobody cared. "It's only bugs," they told me.
Stupidity and short-sightedness, it seems, is fashionable these days...
